Language Learning

I have nothing against textbooks outright, but I do have something against learning only with a textbook. It makes me very sad, both as a language learner and as a language teacher.

I hope the title was incendiary enough to get you to click, and my explanations will be enough to carry you to the end.

I will go into more depth about my Spanish language journey in another article, but here are the most relevant points:

I studied Spanish I to IV in high school. I took Spanish 200-something in college. I took another Spanish at my community college.

I loved Spanish and got A’s in my classes.

After all of that, how much Spanish did I know? A great deal.

How much could I speak? A comparably dreadful amount.

ㅤ
